title: Polish Playboy Cover Typeface
content:
The image is from the cover of Polish Playboy magazine 4/2012. By searching the web, the earliest issues showing this typeface I could find were from 2005, thus, the typeface must have been designed in 2005 or earlier. It looks so familiar, maybe because it's similar to Farnham?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Playboy_5558.png)
author: Joshua K.

comments.content: No, it's a different typeface. Compare for example the bottom serifs (rectangular in Farnham, triangular in this typeface) and the beaks on F and T (angular in Farnham, slightly rounded in this typeface).

You're right, I was too hasty to conclude, it's definitely not Farnham. So, how about [Mercury Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070337/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/mercury-display/overview)?
Right, that's it. Thank you both!
